Name: Candy Match 3
About the game: This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Rearrange sweets and make combinations, opening up new dimensions in this magical game. Features of Candy Match 3: * 1000 delightful levels * Colorful graphics with characters * Many exciting game modes
